actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution establishing an Emergency Task force on the Economy.

summary.text: Establishes an Emergency Task Force on the Economy. States that it shall be the function of the Emergency Task Force on the Economy to carry out a thorough study of the state of the economy and to report to the President and the Congress on its findings together with a comprehensive plan for dealing with the economic problems identified.

titles.title: A joint resolution establishing an Emergency Task force on the Economy.
